metadata.description: Platform standards, skills, and scaffold templates for multi-tenant SaaS on Cloudflare Workers + Neon PostgreSQL

plugins.name: multi-tenant-platform
plugins.description: 3-tier multi-tenant architecture patterns with RLS, tenant hierarchy, and white-label support

plugins.name: graduated-auth
plugins.description: Graduated authentication from anonymous to full account without friction walls

plugins.name: neon-multi-tenant
plugins.description: Neon PostgreSQL multi-tenant patterns with branch isolation, Hyperdrive, and Drizzle ORM

plugins.name: theme-inspired-tokens
plugins.description: Culturally-grounded design token systems with W3C DTCG alignment and Style Dictionary
